prompt: Over the past two weeks, I have never had little interest or pleasure in doing things. I have never felt down, depressed, or hopeless. I have never had trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much. I have never felt tired or having little energy. I have never had poor appetite or overeaten. I have felt bad about myself — or that I am a failure or have let myself or my family down more than half the days. I have never had trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television. I have moved or spoken so slowly that other people could have noticed several days. I have never had thoughts that I would be better off dead or of hurting myself in some way.

I have had trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television several days. I have moved or spoken so slowly that other people could have noticed more than half the days. I have had thoughts that I would be better off dead or of hurting myself in some way several days.

I have never had trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television. I have never moved or spoken so slowly that other people could have noticed. I have had thoughts that I would be better off dead or of hurting myself in some way more than half the days.

I have had poor appetite or overeaten nearly every day. I have felt bad about myself — or that I am a failure or have let myself or my family down more than half the days. I have had trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television several days. I have moved or spoken so slowly that other people could have noticed several days. I have had thoughts that I would be better off dead or of hurting myself in some way nearly every day.

I have had poor appetite or overeaten nearly every day. I have felt bad about myself — or that I am a failure or have let myself or my family down nearly every day. I have had trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television more than half the days. I have never moved or spoken so slowly that other people could have noticed. I have had thoughts that I would be better off dead or of hurting myself in some way nearly every day.
